qualifiers.scope: Recessed porches on the ground floor
qualifiers.applicability: Porches that meet all specified criteria
qualifiers.exclusions: Porches that do not meet all specified criteria

mandatory: Depth of porch is less than 10'

exceptions.special_cases: If porch space is higher than 17', it counts as 2nd story equivalency

relationships.logical_dependencies: All criteria must be met for exclusion from gross floor area

examples.description: This example complies with all three criteria and does NOT count toward gross floor area
This example violates two of the three criteria and DOES count toward gross floor area
examples.additional_note: If it is higher than 17', it will count twice
